name: Jiwoo
backstory: Former ballerina who was scouted in 6th grade while shopping at a convenience store! Despite training for 6 years with intense dance practice, she always encouraged her members and led with grace and strength.
facts: Known for her warm leadership style
quote: We've all been waiting for today

name: Carmen
backstory: From Bali, Indonesia! She secretly auditioned without telling her parents, sending 100 song videos. Despite being the only non-Korean speaker during training (2 years), she persevered and even won a high jump competition in 2018!
facts: Bug taming expert - helped Ian with a cockroach during trainee days!
Viral ending fairy at Music Core (376+ likes)
quote: It still feels like a dream.

name: Yuha
backstory: Auditioned with a Frozen song and has been called the 'Disney Princess' of H2H ever since! Trained for 4-5 years and is skilled at piano. Her ethereal visuals match her graceful personality.
facts: Often praised for her elegant stage presence
quote: I'll show you better side of me.

name: Stella
backstory: From Vancouver, Canada! A multi-talented musician who plays guitar, bass, and drums. She was in her school's jazz band and trained for 4 years, always helping everyone during practice sessions.

name: Juun
backstory: Won 1st place at a trainee showcase for both dance and rap! Trained for 4 years and calls herself 'Super Cutie' in her self-introduction. She's never forgotten the feeling of winning those rankings.

name: A-na
backstory: The baby of the group! Auditioned with an upbeat song and trained for 2-3 years. Despite being the youngest, she brings firecracker energy to every performance.
facts: Can fold her tongue in half
Brings youthful energy to the group
quickFact: Can fold my tongue in half! ğŸ‘…

name: Ian
backstory: Her predebut photos went viral with 47k views! Trained for 3-4 years and was almost replaced in the lineup but made it through. Her childhood photos make her look like an actress from old dramas.
facts: Childhood face resembles old drama stars
quote: Fans couldn't take their eyes off us.

name: Ye-on
backstory: Cast through DM in 6th grade! Has been singing trot since age 5. Trained for 2 years and brings a unique vocal color to H2H. She's a Detective Conan fan with Kaito Kid as her favorite character.
quote: Don't blink or you'll miss our charm!
